title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of information technology in schools? - Quora

response.answer_text: The advantages and disadvantages of information technology in schools are as follows: Advantages: Information technology in schools have improved engagement.It has encouraged individual learning.Students are keen to learn new things.Disadvantages: Students find it easy to cheat in the classroom.Face to face interaction is affected because of this.It could cause students to use unreliable resources for learning.
